sentences.en: A young Moroccan stopped by police refused to show his papers.
sentences.cn: 一位被警察拦下的摩洛哥青年拒绝出示他的证件。

sentences.en: At the police station, I was charged with assault.
sentences.cn: 在警察局，我被指控殴打他人。

sentences.en: Attacks were reported on police, vehicles and commercial premises.
sentences.cn: 据报道，警察、车辆和商业经营场所均遭到袭击。

sentences.en: He announced that the army and police had been confined to barracks.
sentences.cn: 他通告说军队和警察已经被禁闭在营房中不得外出。

sentences.en: He then held the man in an armlock until police arrived.
sentences.cn: 然后他反扭住那名男子的手臂让他动弹不得，直到警察赶到。

sentences.en: He was returned to prison in 1977 for impersonating a police officer.
sentences.cn: 他1977年因冒充警官而再次入狱。

sentences.en: Her assistant was accused of theft and fraud by the police.
sentences.cn: 她的助手被警方指控犯有盗窃和欺诈罪。

sentences.en: His best friend was killed by police under extremely questionable circumstances.
sentences.cn: 他最好的朋友在极其可疑的情况下被警察打死了。

sentences.en: Police investigating a £10 million car insurance fiddle arrested 16 people yesterday.
sentences.cn: 调查涉及1,000万英镑的汽车保险诈骗案的警察昨天逮捕了16人。
警察围在法院大楼四周。

sentences.en: The army was brought in to police the city centre.
sentences.cn: 调来军队维持市中心的治安。

sentences.en: The crowds became violent and threw petrol bombs at the police.
sentences.cn: 人群变得狂暴起来，并向警察投掷汽油弹。

sentences.en: The man was known to the police because of previous convictions.
sentences.cn: 因为有犯罪前科，警察们都认识这个人。

sentences.en: The police told me. It was a bombshell. I had no idea.
sentences.cn: 是警察告诉我的。我很震惊，完全没想到。

sentences.en: They arrested the men and frog-marched them to the local police station.
sentences.cn: 他们逮捕了这些人，并把他们押送到当地警察局。

sentences.en: This will mean more remand prisoners being held in police cells.
sentences.cn: 这将意味着更多候审犯人会被拘押在警局拘留室。

sentences.en: Two men were helping police with their inquiries at Salisbury last night.
sentences.cn: 两名男子昨天夜里在索尔兹伯里接受了警方盘问。

words.tran_cn: 监督；管辖；维持治安；为…配备警察

phrases.tran_cn: 警察权，治安权；警察部队
n. 警察国家；极权国家

trans.tran_cn: 警察部门，警方，警察，治安
trans.tran_en: the people who work for an official organization whose job is to catch criminals and make sure that people obey the law

trans.tran_cn: 监督；管辖；维持治安；为…配备警察
trans.tran_en: to keep control over a particular area in order to make sure that laws are obeyed and that people and property are protected, using a police or military force

trans.tran_cn: （警察、军队等）巡查，维护治安，（委员会等）监督，管制
